ygData.subject: Re: Wizzards and the assertion that we can solo. (long, sorry)
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  How can you beg to differ? This is not an opinion. It is experience and fact. If you re-read the above statement. Dayne IS NOT capable , should be
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 30 May 1999 20:49:04 +0200, you wrote:

>From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
>
>According to dayne@...:
>> Dayne IS NOT capable of soloing most blues, nor some greens. It IS
>> that simple. Root holds about 50% of the time. BLUES resist about 25%
>> of my spells.
>
>I beg to differ. I'm not 12, I'm 11th, and I can solo and take:
> Orc Centurions, Lions, Lioness (East Commonlands)
> Sand Scarabs (North Ro)
<snip>
How can you beg to differ? This is not an opinion. It is experience
and fact. If you re-read the above statement. "Dayne IS NOT capable",
should be self explanatory enough. I make no arguments that other
wizards are not capable of soloing. I only offer proof that there is
some kind of problem with the class.

This was not meant to be a flame, I think you may have just
misunderstood the post.

I will make a guess that there may be some type of algorithm with
success at the carious checks that needs some tweaking by Verrant.
This is just opinion, but it is really the only logical explanation
for the varied experience on this list that I can come up with.

Like I stated before, my other wizards did not have any problems like
these and neither do my other characters.
Dayne D'Gorith, Teir'dal Faern of house D'Gorith
and Guild Har'oloth on the Karana Server
www.drow.net
